languages.text: "Угольно-черный страх окрашивает его душу. Я сомневаюсь, что их можно сбросить лишь усилием воли..."
"Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."
languages.original_text: "Угольно-черный страх окрашивает его душу. Я сомневаюсь, что их можно сбросить лишь усилием воли..."

traits.locale_text: "‘Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."
"‘Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."

"Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."
"Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."
"Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."

languages.text: «Su alma está teñida de negro puro. Dudo que vayamos a echarlo a base de fuerza de voluntad...».
languages.original_text: "Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."

traits.locale_text: «Su alma está teñida de negro puro. Dudo que vayamos a echarlo a base de fuerza de voluntad...».

languages.text: 「炭のように黒い恐怖が彼の魂を染めている。単なる意志の力でそれを消し去ることができるとは思えません…」
languages.original_text: "Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."

traits.locale_text: 「炭のように黒い恐怖が彼の魂を染めている。単なる意志の力でそれを消し去ることができるとは思えません…」

languages.text: “煤黑色的恐惧玷污了他的灵魂，仅凭意志力恐怕不足以战胜恐惧……”
languages.original_text: "Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."

traits.locale_text: “煤黑色的恐惧玷污了他的灵魂，仅凭意志力恐怕不足以战胜恐惧……”

languages.text: "Seine Seele ist von pechschwarzer Furcht umhüllt. Ich bezweifle, dass man sie durch schiere Willenskraft abstreifen kann ..."
languages.original_text: "Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Seele ist von pechschwarzer Furcht umhüllt. Ich bezweifle, dass man sie durch schiere Willenskraft abstreifen kann ..."

languages.text: « Son âme est teintée d'une peur noire comme la nuit. Et je doute qu'il puisse s'en débarrasser par la simple force de sa volonté… »
languages.original_text: "Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."

traits.locale_text: « Son âme est teintée d'une peur noire comme la nuit. Et je doute qu'il puisse s'en débarrasser par la simple force de sa volonté… »

languages.text: "Kömür karası korku ruhunu karanlığa boyamış. Salt irade gücüyle defedilebileceğinden kuşkuluyum..."
languages.original_text: "Coal-black fear colours his soul. I doubt it can be cast off by mere force of will..."
